page.title: 03Borthwick to Crichton
page.content: It was Tuesday morning and I was awakened by my older sister drying her hair."Get up Diane" I heard my mum shout upstairs.I had to be quick because my mum was going to her work early.I quickly dressed and hurried downstairs to have my breakfast.It was just about time to leave for school.I was just walking along the road to Pauline's house when I remembered we were going to walk from Borthwick to Crichton castle today with Mr Wright for the Domesday project.Pauline and I walked down to school together and met Michelle and everbody else.When we arrived at 9.00am Mr.Smith the student was there too.17 children, Mr Ross and Mr Wright squashed ourselves into the mini bus and the remainder travelled with Mr Smith in his car. (continued)
